title: What are the benefits of travel technology solutions for Travel Industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Travel Technology Solutions for Travel Industry will benefits all three - Service Providers - The Hotel, Airline and Railway IndustryVisitors - The end UsersThe Travel Agency - AgentsThe Service Provider point of view, the existing hotels & airlines will be able to sell their opaque inventory. Selling the room night and flight tickets at a dynamic rates. The new hotels and flights to new destination can showcase entry on the platform of Travel industry. The User’s point of view, they can book the stay and flight from their work place or home and even through mobile app. They can try out the new hotels. The users can avail the opaque rates and get higher discounts. The Travel Agency point of view, opens opportunity for business. They bring all the hotels and airlines under one roof, aiding users to have plenty of options to select from. Opaque rates floated by hoteliers and airlines are easily conveyed to the end users. In short the technology is making the Travel and Hotel Industry very handy for the visitors / users, who in turn help to strengthen the economy in these Industry.

Technology solutions for the travel industry are focused around the most current trends and technologies, namely Mobilization, Virtual Reality, metasearch through voice activation, and so on. In the same manner as other customer-centric businesses, the travel and tourism sector has already begun to adopt innovative technologies and to provide unprecedented services to travelers across the globe. Travelers are finding the ideal match for their travel and stay needs from among a host of IT solutions for the travel industry. Virtual Reality: By wielding futuristic VR technology in the travel industry, businesses are equipped to offer their customers a sampling of various travel spots from the comfort of their homes. So they get to decide on their trips and destinations with more insights. Geolocation-based services: With mobile devices and Internet connections people no longer get lost while travelling. Travel businesses are building and deploying geolocation applications to enable their customers to locate their destinations easily. Wearable Tech: To keep pace with the latest technologies airlines have started using smartwatch boarding passes while hotels are using smartwatch apps which give their guests remote access to their door locks. Mobile Devices and iBeacons: Specifically airlines, are exploring mobility technology solutions within the travel industry. With the iBeacon technology they are able to provide location-specific services to their consumers, and at the same time enhancing the traveler’s journey and overall experience.
